channel.title: Need link or tut to changing exp on training
channel.description: For a real valid explination on what I need is this. I really need a tut or link to changing how much experience you get when you hit monsters. And also I needa link or tut on how to change the experience on the training objects that you hit.Please help me =]

item.title: Need link or tut to changing exp on training
item.dc:creator: @draws187 draws187
item.source: Need link or tut to changing exp on training

item.title: Need link or tut to changing exp on training
item.dc:creator: @eclipse245 eclipse245
item.description:
@eclipse245 wrote:

Look search for “You attack the dummy” Or “You start to attack the dummy” You should see something like

case 823: if (actionTimer == 0) { sendMessage("You attack the sac a' dung"); stillgfx(336, absY, absX); setAnimation(0x326); addSkillXP((40*playerLevel[0]), 0); addSkillXP((30*playerLevel[3]), 3); addSkillXP((20*playerLevel[18]), 18); actionTimer = 12; } break;
where is says addSkillXP((??*playerlevel[0]),0; Change the “??” to w/e number you want…and everytime u attack the dummy you will get tht much xp

Read full topic
item.source: Need link or tut to changing exp on training
